title: How to Crouch in Fortnite + Change Settings on All Platforms

steps.title: Press Left Ctrl to crouch on a PC.
steps.content: Press Left Ctrl to crouch on a PC. If your character isn't crouching in Fortnite , you may have set a different keybind for this action. To check your crouch key, skip to the Changing Crouch Key section.

steps.title: Press Left bumper (L1) to crouch on PlayStation.
steps.content: Press Left bumper (L1) to crouch on PlayStation. This button works for both PS4 and PS5 controllers. If your character isn't crouching, check your crouch key .

steps.title: Press Left bumper to crouch on Xbox.
steps.content: Press Left bumper to crouch on Xbox. You should only need to tap it once to stay crouched. If it doesn't stay, you may have toggle crouch turned off. If your character isn't crouching, check your crouch keybinds .

steps.title: Press R3 to crouch on Switch.
steps.content: Press R3 to crouch on Switch. R3 is the right joystick. When you press it, you should hear or feel a small click. If this button doesn't work, check your crouch key .

steps.title: Open the game menu.
steps.content: Open the game menu. This will vary depending on your device. [1] X Research source PC : Press ESC . PlayStation : Press Options Xbox : Press Menu Nintendo Switch : Press Menu and then the cog icon

steps.title: Select Settings.
steps.content: Select Settings . This is the cog icon.

steps.title: Select Keybinds.
steps.content: Select Keybinds . This is the tab at the top. On consoles, this may look like Controller Options or Wireless Controller . You can also change the keybinds for emoting and thanking the bus driver.

steps.title: Select Crouch.
steps.content: Select Crouch . You may need to scroll down to find it.

steps.title: Set a new crouch key.
steps.content: Set a new crouch key. When you select the keybind, press another button to assign it to crouch instead. On PC, some players have crouch set to C . Toggle crouch allows you to turn off and on crouch mode by tapping the button once. If you'd rather hold down the crouch button to stay crouched, toggle it Off .

steps.title: Select Apply.
steps.content: Select Apply . This will save your settings. You can also change performance and graphics settings for better gameplay.
